content: Let's collect some White Zinnia specimens and plant them on the island - it will definitely enhance our ecological diversity!
Plant 20 White Daisy Plants on the main island and let's observe the environmental changes!
Actually, there are other methods we can try! Previously we only introduced fish and insects from other planets, but this time we could experiment with introducing some different flora!
Now we can explore the unique species on other planets - I have some checklists prepared!
Not bad at all! The lilies have really enhanced the environmental vitality. Let's observe the ecological changes over time!
Active collection efforts serve as a positive stimulus for the ecosystem! And you've already accomplished that!
I see you've successfully introduced and released organisms from other planets! Give it some time - by tomorrow at the latest! New species will definitely emerge in the environment!
New life forms will definitely emerge!
Would you like to see more creatures?
Collect 3 fish and 3 insects from other planets and release them here! This will definitely trigger ecological variations, leading to the emergence of new species!
I see your handbook is coming along nicely! I have some suggestions if you're looking to attract more new species to your environment.
In short, we can collect 3 fish and 3 insects from other planets and release them into our planet's ecosystem. This will definitely improve our current ecological environment!
I see you've made some progress with your handbook. Perhaps you'd like to further diversify the ecological environment?
